text: Cnephasia disforma is a species of moth of the family Tortricidae. It is found on Crete.Fauna Europaea The wingspan is about 14 mm for males and 15 mm for females. The forewings are grey, strigulated with brown-grey. The hindwings are brown grey.Razowski, J. (1983): Descriptions of New Cnephasia CURTIS (Tortricidae). — Nota lepidopterologica 6 (4): 235-238 Adults have been recorded on wing from May to June. ==References== Category:Moths described in 1983 Category:Cnephasia Category:Taxa named by Józef Razowski
title: Cnephasia disforma
